tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    log_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    technician_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Device(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceRecord (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_details TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_log_id FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceLog(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID REFERENCES Device(device_id),
  maintenance_frequency VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL
);
